articles.title: 'Paper tablet' remarkable, could challenge Apple, Samsung, Lenovo: Experts - ETTelecom
articles.description: The device is powered by a proprietary operating system which does not offer internet browsing, emailing, messaging or any other features of a regular tablet or smartphone. Rather, it can convert handwritten notes to computer-generated text.
articles.content: Mumbai: Apple, Samsung and Lenovo's premium tablets could face competition in the India market in future from a new entrant, Norway-based ‘paper tablet’ brand, remarkable, said experts, who added tha… [+2487 chars]

articles.title: Scientists reveal heat can behave like sound in superfluid - WION
articles.description: Scientists have revealed that in some exotic states of matter, heat can behave like sound and bounce back and forth. The phenomenon is not new and is known as “second sound.” But the scientists at MIT have for the first time captured the images of the ‘second…
